name: WW2 Dummy Tank PVP
description:
One of my first "completed" prototypes

Controls:

Grey  Tank (Tiger): WASD to move, Q and E to move turret, X to shoot mchine gun, C to shoot cannon.

Green Tank (T34): Arrows to move, Comma and Period to move turret, Minus (subtract symbol) to shoot machine gun, Alt to shoot Cannon
